trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> in the conditions collection and enables you to programmatically evaluate the condition.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> 조건 컬렉션에 프로그래밍 방식으로 조건을 확인할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> 평가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual condition definition behind a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>, which is derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>형식 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> 에서 파생 된,</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> 이</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> 뒤에 있는 실제 조건 정의

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the condition evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>조건이를 반환 하는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets member properties based on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> points to.
trans-unit.target: 에 따라 멤버 속성을 설정의 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> 하 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref> 를 가리킵니다.
